entry.title: As Russian Troops Flee Lyman, Ukrainians Rejoice---and Help Themselves to Russian Supplies
entry.content: Ambushed during their hasty retreat from the recaptured city, Moscowâ€™s forces left behind burning vehicles and bodies of soldiers along the roadsides.

entry.title: Ukraine Gains Full Control of Lyman, Days After Putin Claimed Russia Rules There
entry.content: President Volodymyr Zelensky said the eastern city had been cleared of Russian forces, scoring a victory against Moscow on the very territory President Vladimir Putin said last week Russia would annex.
